# init(device:)

**Initializer**

Initializes with a specific GPU to render into.

## Declaration

```swift
init(device: any MTLDevice)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: A Metal device.

## Return Value

A new renderer object.

## Discussion

Pass in the same Metal device that is associated to the Metal command buffer passed into [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKRenderer/render(withViewport:commandBuffer:renderPassDescriptor:)].

## First Steps

- **scene**: The scene this renderer will draw into the Metal command buffer.
